description:
Sousuke`s team may be carrying a nuclear warhead, but nothing seems to keep Zaied’s forces at bay. Meanwhile, Gray and his crew are stunned by Gauron’s massive power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bate vânt spre casă partea a III-a
Il vento che danza in patria - Parte finale
Le vent souffle à la maison (3)
Mit dem Wind in die Heimat, Teil 3
The Wind Blows at Home, Part 3
Ветер, гуляющий по моей Родине. Часть 3
